verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> shir A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לִשְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <WH8010> lish-Lo-Moh for Solomon אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh Except the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִבְנֶ֬ה <WH1129> yiv-Neh build בַ֗יִת <WH1004> Va-yit, the house שָׁ֤וְא׀ <WH7723> shav in vain עָמְל֣וּ <WH5998> 'a-me-Lu they labour בוֹנָ֣יו <WH1129> vo-Nav that build בּ֑וֹ bo; אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh it except the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> yish-mor- keep עִ֝֗יר <WH5892> 'Ir, the city שָׁ֤וְא׀ <WH7723> shav [but] in vain שָׁקַ֬ד <WH8245> sha-Kad waketh שׁוֹמֵֽר׃ <WH8104> sho-Mer. the watchman

שָׁ֤וְא <WH7723> shav [It is] vain לָכֶ֨ם׀ la-Chem מַשְׁכִּ֪ימֵי <WH7925> mash-Ki-mei early ק֡וּם <WH6965> kum for you to rise up מְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH309> me-'a-cha-rei- late שֶׁ֗בֶת <WH3427> She-vet, to sit up אֹ֭כְלֵי <WH398> 'O-che-lei to eat לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem the bread הָעֲצָבִ֑ים <WH6089> ha-'a-tza-Vim; of sorrows כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> ken after that יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yit-Ten [for] so he giveth לִֽידִיד֣וֹ <WH3039> li-di-Do his beloved שֵׁנָֽא׃ <WH8142> she-Na. sleep

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat [are] an heritage יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> ba-Nim; Lo children שָׂ֝כָ֗ר <WH7939> Char, [is his] reward פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> pe-Ri [and] the fruit הַבָּֽטֶן׃ <WH990> hab-Ba-ten. of the womb

כְּחִצִּ֥ים <WH2671> ke-chitz-Tzim As arrows בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- [are] in the hand גִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor; of a mighty man כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> Ken, So בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei so [are] children הַנְּעוּרִֽים׃ <WH5271> han-ne-'u-Rim. of the youth

אַשְׁרֵ֤י <WH835> 'ash-Rei Happy הַגֶּ֗בֶר <WH1397> hag-Ge-ver, [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose מִלֵּ֥א <WH4390> mil-Le full אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַשְׁפָּת֗וֹ <WH827> ash-pa-To, that hath his quiver מֵ֫הֶ֥ם <WH1992> me-Hem like לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu; of them they shall not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- When יְדַבְּר֖וּ <WH1696> ye-dab-be-Ru but they shall speak אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אוֹיְבִ֣ים <WH341> 'oy-Vim with the enemies בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> bash-Sha-'ar. in the gate
